28( ), 2806, and 2814 Richmomd Terrace, south side, between Van Nawwe and Van Pelt Avenues, showing "Captains' Row," houses uilt by sone of Staten Island's oystermen. No. 22800 be.unged to JJ. Van Name from 1874 to 1898; to Sophie Van Name in 1907, and to J. H. Van Name in 1917. No. 280B was, from 1874 to 1B2B, the P. Van Name house and, in 19007 the Thos. W. Butts house. No. 2B14, kI own as "ghe Colonial' was nuilt by Captain Garrett P. Wright. It was the Wright house from 1.74 to 1R2B; the Louis Decker house in 1907, and the A. M. Decker house in 1917.
